sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.IBMWatsonNLUService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Interacts with the IBM Watson NLU Server.</description>
        <name>IBMWatsonNLUService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var IBMWatsonNLUService = Class.create();
IBMWatsonNLUService.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.HttpNLUService, {
	initialize: function() {
		HttpNLUService.prototype.initialize.call(this);
		this._userId = gs.getProperty('com.glide.nlu.ibmwatson.intent.discovery.user_id', gs.getUserName());
	},

	preparePredictRequestBody: function(utterance) {
		return JSON.stringify(
			{
				"context": {
					"metadata": {
						"user_id": this._userId
					}
				},
				"input": {
					"text": utterance
				}
			});
	},

	type: 'IBMWatsonNLUService'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-26 22:50:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7118493a3b33230074bc456993efc464</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>47</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>IBMWatsonNLUService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Proxy Agent to the IBM Watson Natural Language Understanding server" source="com.glide.nlu.ibmwatson.intent.discovery">b3377e0f2f400110d8a4d5f62799b6d2</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7118493a3b33230074bc456993efc464</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-20 22:38:12</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>552</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
